1.0.name: wordpress/agent-image-news
1.0.description:
Agent Image is a real estate Internet marketing agency and website design company that has launched over 13,000 lead-generating websites since 1999.

The company's web marketing approach is smart and effective, leveraging the power of SEO, genuine content and beautiful, user-friendly designs for all their real estate websites.

Agent Intelligence News is a great plugin allowing any Wordpress user to get the latest tech news from Agent Image. Our article topics are for real estate professionals, agents and brokers who want to stay up-to-date with the best real estate tech tips, web marketing advice, social media news and helpful website how-to's.

This plugin also allows you quick access to popular Internet marketing products and services from Agent Image.
